Hey! Who are you?

Hello! My name is NhÃ n and I enjoy creating things with own hands, experience and skills. I used to be an interpreter and tour guide because of my passion in languages. But now, with a huge passion in programming, I have thrived to pursue my dream of being a full-stack web developer. Hold my hand and hope for my best.

What has brought you to web development?

My interest in web development started back in 2021 after 2 years learning programming with Python. Then I encounter an introductory section to HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The more I dived into the web structure, the more I fall in love with JavaScript. As time goes by, I have developed my problem solving skills along with a strong grasp of JavaScript. And as a language lover, it hooked me (Though I know human languages and programming languages are not so the same).

You love JavaScript, so are you familiar with any JavaScript framework just yet?

ReactJS!!! Yeah I know it's not a framework, just a library. But to put it simply, React plays a huge role in web development in the recent years, so it's worth to be proficient at it. I'm currently planning to learn React Native. Of course, there are still lots of differences, but I believe foundation of ReactJS is a huge help for me. Some other JavaScript frameworks I have actually familiarized myself with are NodeJS (with ExpressJS to build backend and API), and jQuery.

Beside JavaScript and Python, what programming languages have you learned?

I've been learning C# recently, for almost 3 months now. NodeJS is a great choice for backend infrastructure. But for a bigger app, backend built in .NET is much more powerful and scalable.

Do you have any experience in professional web dev job?

I've had 1 year of Front-End experience working with vanila JavaScript to build inclusive, customizable eCommerce templates on Shopify.
Since March 2022, I have joined the product team at Halosoft to maintain Ella theme - the bestseller Shopify theme on Envato market.
On October, I was assigned a project to build a Bonnita theme on top of the Ella theme alone within 2 weeks.
I have also joined to rebuild the Halosoft Official Site. The site is still under development, but most of the sliders and transitions are done by me.

What are you seeking now?

With the desire to learn more about new technologies, I decided to launch my own project that resembles a fully functional eCommerce site, but with React and Express. I never stop my journey of acquiring skills and knowledge in the programming world.
